channel.title: port on owen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in port on owen's blog

item.title: 修改常用端口
item.description: 修改 ssh 22 端口 vi /etc/ssh/sshd_config Port 8963 sysemctl restart sshd 修改 git 对应端口 vi /.git/config url = ssh://git@ovenx.cn:8963/root/test.git rsync 指定端口 rsync -e 'ssh -p 8963' ssh 指定端口 ssh -p 8963 root@ovenx.cn "systemctl restart heepark" 修改 MySQL 3306 端口 vi /etc/my.cnf.d/server.cnf [mysqld] port=9782 systemctl restart mariadb
